title: Clinton Foundation Cargo Ship Raided at Port of Baltimore Reveals ‘Sick Secret’?
subtitle: Articles alleging that a cargo ship owned by the Clinton Foundation was found to contain foreign refugees and illegal substances are fake news.
author: David Emery
vclaim: A Clinton Foundation cargo ship arriving from Africa was raided and found to contain "illegal contraband" in the form of foreign refugees, narcotics, weapons, and illegal fruits.
